Make the JSON for each correct\_answer letter match the correct answer to the matching question's question\_number from your previous responses of the hypothetical exam questions starting at 75 and going backwards from there.

Here's an updated JSON with correct answers matching the question\_number in reverse order (from 75 to 1):
